data.text:
@chrisgasm thanks, it’s not back yet but who knows

in austria they’re about to lift most of the mask mandates and most of 3g as well - so if i hadn’t gotten it last weekend i sure would next week lol how is it in germany atm?
@thorinyaki Hope it returns ASAP! I have yet to get it but I know its only a matter of time
@Letsrunandhide thanks! omg i hope so too - the long-term effects are what i’m most scared of tbh
but it also makes me wonder what version i got and how much worse it would’ve been if i wasn’t vaccinated
very cool update: i’ve also lost my senses of smell/taste and it’s so weirdddddd

lol the local government made me walk to a drive-in test facility in the industrial wasteland of the suburbs for my pcr test

thanks for that
